<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hippocampus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3050)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hippocampi serve as steeds for aquatic humanoids or roam wild in the sea.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hippocampus.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Hippocampus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3050)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=533" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 196 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +4, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 24

</row>

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=54)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 17

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +7 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Sudden Retreat** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then Swims with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Aquatic Cavalry</title>

Protecting the harbor of Absalom and the shores of Starstone Isle, the elite Wave Riders use combat-trained hippocampi as mounts. The Wave Riders harass enemy ships, defend against aquatic foes, and intercept smugglers.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-429" />
